text: all heard about those wonderful food and
wine pairings but I think when it comes
to a lively celebration there's nothing
better than a signature cocktail and a
great dip for everyone to gather around
this one really fits the bill especially
because only takes five minutes to
prepare all you need is a pie dish a big
block of feta and this is a 12-ounce
block of sheep's milk feta cheese which
is really delicious put that right in
the middle of the dish then I have half
a cup of olive oil and pour this right
over the top and into the dish and these
are canned artichokes they're really
easy to use you just have to drain them
these are already have and then cut into
quarters and I'm going to have them
again just want to get them into nice
small pieces just cut right through and
these just scatter around the outside so
that when you dip in you'll get a little
bit of artichoke a little bit of feta
few on top right I have lemon will do
five or however many you want strips of
lemon zest just the yellow part you
don't want the white pit put those
around and then I have red chili flake
this will add a little kick to this dish
quarter teaspoon just all over and then
I have some fresh oregano one about a
tablespoon of leaves and you can just
pull them right off the stem and scatter
them around and now it's done all you
have to do cover it with parchment lined
file they'll go into a 350-degree oven
until everything is warm through it'll
take about 40 minutes you can do that
ahead of time keep it warm under the
foil and then just pop it back into the
oven to rewarm before you're ready to
serve it was that easy
so our dip is ready is nice and hot this
is how you want to serve it oh it looks
delicious can smell all that olive oil
and the lemon and the oregano smells so
good so you want to set this out with
some nice toast or crackers and little
plate so everybody can help themselves
and then guests can just scoop into the
cheese which is really nice and soft now
and grab up some of that olive oil from
the bottom it's good to have a spoon for
this so they can spread it grab the
olive oil drizzle it over and an
artichoke on top you can even do this
for your guests as well and just hand
them one and this make such a fabulous
dip and such a great solution to easy
entertaining
you
